name: p14-package-dropdown-wealth-health
author: Lisitius
description: Module dropdown pour le projet 14 d'OpenClassrooms

scripts.build: del -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --copy-files --ignore __tests__,spec.js,test.js,__snapshots__
scripts.clean:fix: del -rf node_modules coverage build dist docs package-lock.json
